item.description:
Learn everything there is to learn about Type 9 the Peacemaker, strengths, defenses, growth and development, relationship dynamics, subtypes of 9. Perfect for 9s, anyone in relationship to a 9, and anyone who wants to learn more about 9s or anyone who wants to be more like a 9! We take a pause at 9:30 if you need to leave early.

7:30 pm - 10:00 pm
($40 - Sliding scale available)

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is an expert in the Enneagram, is a therapist, personal coach and trainer in groups and organizations, specializing in working with personality differences and way to bridge those differences - to work and relate together more effectively.
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, corner of Tanager and Wollaston and West St.
item.why: Great way to understand Type 9s in depth and learn how to relate to 9s and 9s relating to others.
